lead_paragraph: BANK--Edward Paul, 74, on Saturday, July 9, 2016. Graduate of University of Pennsylvania. LLB and LLM (in Taxation) NYU School of Law. Enjoyed a distinguished career. Survived by his loving partner and husband of 55 years, Steven Narker, brother Stephen Bank (Judi), sister-in-law Ilene Bosch (Eric), nieces, nephews, and their loving children. Services today 12:45pm at "The Riverside", 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave. Donations in his memory may be made to MSKCC or Brookhaven Hospital. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BANK, EDWARD PAUL
